summary: Student data management website with fields for name, email, and UID. Users can add and edit student records. Public access (no authentication). UID manually entered by users.
architectural_notes: Student data structure: name, email, UID

existing_features.title: Create a React frontend with a form containing input fields for student name, email, and UID where users can manually enter data and submit to add new records
Display a list of all student records showing name, email, and UID with an edit button for each record that allows users to modify the data
Implement the frontend with no authentication or login requirements, allowing public access to all features
Design the interface with a warm, educational theme using earthy tones like terracotta and sage green with clean typography and card-based layouts for student records

new_feature_requests.summary: Add student records with name, email, and UID fields
View list of all student records
Create a Motoko backend actor with a Student type containing name (Text), email (Text), and uid (Text) fields, and a stable variable to store an array of students that persists across upgrades
Implement backend methods to add a new student record, retrieve all students, update an existing student by index or unique identifier, and return appropriate success/error responses
